headline.main: NAZI HINT SCORNED BY SWEDISH PAPER; Berlin Reference to Expelling Britons Draws Attack From Goeteborg CAUTIOUS POLICY SHELVED German Radio Is Heard Here Warning Stockholm on Its Attitude About Norway

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Oct. 24 -- When two days ago Swedish newspaper men asked a Berlin Foreign Office spokesman about the attitude of Germany toward the expulsion of Germans from Afghanistan, he retorted:
abstract: Goeteborg Handelstidningen scorns German hint that Sweden expel Brit; German radio warns Sweden on attitude toward Norway
